languages.text: Основная часть пустотного корабля. Целостность корпуса отражает степень повреждений, которые понес пустотный корабль. Эти повреждения остаются после боя и требуют ремонта. Используйте {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}металлолом{/g}, чтобы отремонтировать корабль и восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}целостность корпуса{/g} судна.

A voidship's core structure. Hull integrity is an indication of the degree of damage the voidship has sustained. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}.
languages.original_text: Основная часть пустотного корабля. Целостность корпуса отражает степень повреждений, которые понес пустотный корабль. Эти повреждения остаются после боя и требуют ремонта. Используйте {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}металлолом{/g}, чтобы отремонтировать корабль и восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}целостность корпуса{/g} судна.

Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}.

A voidship's core structure. Hull integrity is an indication of the degree of damage the voidship has sustained. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}.

languages.text: Die Kernstruktur eines Raumschiffs. Rumpfintegrität zeigt an, wie stark das Raumschiff beschädigt wurde. Dieser Schaden bleibt auch nach dem Kampf bestehen und muss repariert werden. Verwende {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g}, um dein Schiff zu reparieren und seine {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfintegrität{/g} wiederherzustellen.
languages.original_text: A voidship's core structure. Hull integrity is an indication of the degree of damage the voidship has sustained. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Kernstruktur eines Raumschiffs. {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfintegrität{/g} zeigt an, wie stark das Raumschiff beschädigt wurde. Dieser Schaden bleibt auch nach dem Kampf bestehen und muss repariert werden. Verwende {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g}, um dein Schiff zu reparieren und seine Rumpfintegrität wiederherzustellen.

languages.text: Structure de base d'un vaisseau spatial. L'intégrité de la coque reflète l'ampleur des dégâts subis par le vaisseau, qui doivent être réparés à l'issue de la bataille. Utilisez des {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g} pour réparer votre vaisseau et rétablir l'{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}intégrité de sa coque{/g}.
languages.original_text: A voidship's core structure. Hull integrity is an indication of the degree of damage the voidship has sustained. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Structure de base d'un vaisseau spatial. L'{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}intégrité de la coque{/g} reflète l'ampleur des dégâts subis par le vaisseau. Ces dégâts doivent être réparés à l'issue de la bataille. Utilisez des {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g} pour réparer votre vaisseau et rétablir l'intégrité de sa coque.

languages.text: 虚空舰的核心结构。舰体完整度代表舰体的损坏程度。舰体承受的损害在战斗结束后依然存在，必须进行修复。您可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}修复舰船，恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体完整度{/g}。
languages.original_text: A voidship's core structure. Hull integrity is an indication of the degree of damage the voidship has sustained. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰的核心结构。{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体完整度{/g}代表舰体的损坏程度。舰体承受的损害在战斗结束后依然存在，必须进行修复。您可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}修复舰船，恢复舰体完整度。

languages.original_text: A voidship's core structure. Hull integrity is an indication of the degree of damage the voidship has sustained. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its hull integrity.

languages.text: Una de las estructuras vitales de toda nave del vacío. La integridad del casco indica la cantidad de daño que ha recibido la nave del vacío. Este daño permanece tras la batalla y es necesario repararlo. Usa {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g} para reparar la nave y restaurar su {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}integridad de casco{/g}.
languages.original_text: A voidship's core structure. Hull integrity is an indication of the degree of damage the voidship has sustained. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Una de las estructuras vitales de toda nave. La {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}integridad del casco{/g} indica la cantidad de daño que ha recibido la nave del vacío. Este daño permanece tras la batalla y es necesario repararlo. Usa {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g} para reparar la nave y restaurar su integridad de casco.

languages.text: ヴォイドシップの中心部の構造。船体の完全性はヴォイドシップが受けたダメージの程度を表す。このダメージは戦いが終わっても残るため、修復しなければならない。{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}を使って船を修理し、{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体の完全性{/g}を回復する。
languages.original_text: A voidship's core structure. Hull integrity is an indication of the degree of damage the voidship has sustained. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドシップの中心部の構造。{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体の完全性{/g}はヴォイドシップが受けたダメージの程度を表す。このダメージは戦いが終わっても残るため、修復しなければならない。{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}を使って船を修理し、船体の完全性を回復する。

languages.text: Uçsuz gemisinin ana kısmı. Gövde bütünlüğü, geminin maruz kaldığı hasarın boyutunun göstergesidir. Bu hasar, çatışma bittikten sonra da kalır ve onarılması gerekir. Gemini onarmak ve {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}gövde bütünlüğünü{/g} tekrar sağlamak için {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}hurda{/g} kullan.
languages.original_text: A voidship's core structure. Hull integrity is an indication of the degree of damage the voidship has sustained. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Use {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship and restore its {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}.
